subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
 
How are you doing today? Well I have a business plan from my company to share with you. Reply this email to send you details of my intent.
 
Thank you,
 
Martin Klonz.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Martin,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm doing quite alright, thank you for asking. Your business plan sounds interesting and I would love to hear more about it. Could you please provide me with some more details?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Michael
